Articles.Content:
I saw just now that after making a few posts, I was at 299 posts. So therefore, this should be my 300th post. (I never did a thread for 100 or 200, so let's go.) First of all, thanks to the wonderful Kerbal Kommunity that has been helping me since late October 2014. It's been a wild ride to 300 posts and nearly 200 rep, and you guys were willing to stick with me through it all. Next, a personal thanks to Starship and zekes, who were (and Starship still is) the people I communicated with the most. Last of all but definitely not least, thank you HarvesteR and Squad as a whole for dreaming up the game, and getting it all the way to 1.0, ***and*** letting me interact with many amazing people. Thank you to all, and have a good time.

Cheers, RAINCRAFER.

![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

EDIT: Also thanks to Astrogamer. I forgot to include him in this post orginally, but this edit is fixing that. He is a great Youtuber and Forum-goer who pleases everyone. RAINCRAFTER, out.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T11:23:38Z" title="05/25/2015 11:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

Congrats! 

*Are we talking about me?*
woot woot
Any other congratulations?

Anyone else?

> 
> Well done Raincrafter, you've been a good member for your first 300, keep it up for your next ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thank you.

> 
> I'm (Almost I think) at 1,000.
> Congrats!
> 
> EDIT:
> 
> I broke 1,000!

Thanks, and Congrats! How did you get that many posts that fast?

EDIT: I just discovered that his posts per day is 13.22, but mine is only 1.48.

EDIT2: Starwhip's post per day ratio is 4.94 exactly.

I just noticed that you joined the forums 1 year and 24 days before me. EXACTLY.

The posts for time around ratio is a lot higher for you, isn't it?

> 
> Whoah whoah whoah, *you joined in March 2015?!?!* That can't be right, can it? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

It's right, but first take a look at Zucal:

Joined Mar 20.

***801*** Points of rep. 322 Posts. 2 Rep points per posts, about.

I only have .5 rep to post ratio, so my posts are, on average, .25 as rep-worthy as Zucal's, so, if rep-to-post ratio is any indication: I have more like 250 posts.

> 
> It's right, but first take a look at Zucal:

Yeah... ok.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-25T00:59:26Z" title="05/25/2015 12:59  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 25, 2015</time> by RAINCRAFTER**

NathanKell's PPD is 14.36

RoverDude's is 15.28

Hmm... my rep to post count ratio is 0.4024.

Must raise over summer!

> 
> Any other congratulations?

Gratz. Nice. Ura. Mashala. Wunderbar. Che dzhaleb.

Dude, post count isn't a measure of anything. it just means that the user prefers posting literally ANYTHING--be it something useful or just useless thread bumps--instead of reading or using that time to make crafts, mods, useful threads, etc. This is the same with rep. Some modders who have invested tons of time into their mods have only a bar or two of rep, while some people who make "replicas" (which look nothing like what they claim to be replicas of) have maxed out their rep bars.

just cheat & tricks and be sure to bee a as hole to be sure to not get too much rep ; ) because ; ) hey yup it's a fun kind of approach sometime ; )

(consider this as a request that i want my rep attrib to be locked ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) )

Some modders who have invested tons of time into their mods have only a bar or two of rep, while some people who make "replicas" (which look nothing like what they claim to be replicas of) have maxed out their rep bars.

Yeah, I guess a few posts on this thread have been bumpy, and i've never put anything on the space exchange, so I guess you're kind of right. Actually, I think the usefulness of these a little bit over 300 posts can be determined by seeing how they can brighten people's days. Will put up interesting poll tomorrow.

EDIT: No poll, the question is asked in a post further down.
